statements: SELECT * FROM tv_shows WHERE production_studio = 'Netflix';
SELECT show_id, show_title FROM tv_shows ORDER BY show_title ASC;
SELECT show_title FROM tv_shows WHERE show_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows WHERE production_studio = 'HBO' ORDER BY show_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT production_studio FROM tv_shows;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows WHERE show_title LIKE 'The%' ORDER BY show_id DESC;
SELECT show_id, show_title FROM tv_shows WHERE production_studio='HBO' ORDER BY show_title;
SELECT show_title, production_studio FROM tv_shows WHERE show_id > 100 ORDER BY production_studio ASC;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows WHERE show_title='Stranger Things' AND production_studio='Netflix';
SELECT show_id, show_title, production_studio FROM tv_shows WHERE production_studio IN ('Netflix', 'Hulu') ORDER BY show_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM TVShows;
SELECT show_name, production_studio_id FROM TVShows;
SELECT show_name, show_id FROM TVShows ORDER BY show_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TVShows WHERE production_studio_id = 1;
SELECT show_name, production_studio_id FROM TVShows WHERE production_studio_id = 1;
SELECT show_name, production_studio_id FROM TVShows WHERE show_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TVShows WHERE show_name LIKE '%Game%';
SELECT show_name, studio_name, country FROM TVShows JOIN ProductionStudios ON TVShows.production_studio_id = ProductionStudios.studio_id;
SELECT show_name, studio_name FROM TVShows JOIN ProductionStudios ON TVShows.production_studio_id = ProductionStudios.studio_id WHERE ProductionStudios.country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM TVShows ORDER BY show_name DESC, production_studio_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM TV_Shows;
SELECT show_name, release_date FROM TV_Shows ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT show_name, studio_name FROM TV_Shows JOIN Show_Studios ON TV_Shows.show_id = Show_Studios.show_id JOIN Studios ON Show_Studios.studio_id = Studios.studio_id;
SELECT show_name, studio_name FROM TV_Shows JOIN Show_Studios ON TV_Shows.show_id = Show_Studios.show_id JOIN Studios ON Show_Studios.studio_id = Studios.studio_id WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT show_name, studio_name FROM TV_Shows JOIN Show_Studios ON TV_Shows.show_id = Show_Studios.show_id JOIN Studios ON Show_Studios.studio_id = Studios.studio_id WHERE studio_name = 'HBO';
SELECT show_name, release_date FROM TV_Shows;
SELECT studio_name FROM Studios ORDER BY studio_name DESC;
SELECT show_name, studio_name FROM TV_Shows JOIN Show_Studios ON TV_Shows.show_id = Show_Studios.show_id JOIN Studios ON Show_Studios.studio_id = Studios.studio_id;

SELECT show_name, studio_name, release_date FROM TV_Shows JOIN Show_Studios ON TV_Shows.show_id = Show_Studios.show_id JOIN Studios ON Show_Studios.studio_id = Studios.studio_id WHERE release_date >= '2020-01-01';

SELECT show_name, studio_name FROM TV_Shows JOIN Show_Studios ON TV_Shows.show_id = Show_Studios.show_id JOIN Studios ON Show_Studios.studio_id = Studios.studio_id ORDER BY show_name ASC, studio_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows;
SELECT show_name, studio_id FROM tv_shows ORDER BY show_name ASC;
SELECT studio_name FROM production_studios WHERE studio_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM episodes WHERE season_id = 5 ORDER BY episode_number DESC;
SELECT show_name, season_number FROM tv_shows JOIN seasons ON tv_shows.show_id = seasons.show_id WHERE season_number > 3;
SELECT show_id, show_name FROM tv_shows WHERE studio_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM production_studios WHERE studio_name LIKE 'W%';
SELECT episode_title, episode_number FROM episodes ORDER BY episode_number DESC;
SELECT show_name, season_number, episode_title FROM tv_shows JOIN seasons ON tv_shows.show_id = seasons.show_id JOIN episodes ON seasons.season_id = episodes.season_id;
SELECT studio_name, COUNT(show_id) AS total_shows FROM production_studios JOIN tv_shows ON production_studios.studio_id = tv_shows.studio_id GROUP BY studio_name ORDER BY total_shows DESC;
SELECT * FROM TVShows;
SELECT show_name, release_date FROM TVShows ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT show_name, studio_name, location FROM TVShows JOIN Studios ON TVShows.studio_id = Studios.studio_id;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM TVShows JOIN ShowGenres ON TVShows.show_id = ShowGenres.show_id WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT show_name, rating FROM TVShows JOIN ShowRatings ON TVShows.show_id = ShowRatings.show_id ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT show_name, release_date FROM TVShows WHERE studio_id = 1;
SELECT s.studio_name, s.location, so.parent_company FROM Studios s JOIN StudiosOwnership so ON s.studio_id = so.studio_id;
SELECT show_name, genre FROM TVShows ts LEFT JOIN ShowGenres sg ON ts.show_id = sg.show_id;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM ShowRatings;
SELECT show_id, show_name, COUNT(*) AS total_genres FROM TVShows ts JOIN ShowGenres sg ON ts.show_id = sg.show_id GROUP BY show_id, show_name;
